hotelDescription: Located in Las Vegas Strip within a mile (2 km) of Fashion Show Mall, Bellagio is within a few miles (5 km) of other popular sights such as University of Nevada-Las Vegas. This 5-star resort welcomes business and leisure travelers with 5 outdoor pools, a full-service spa, and a casino. Near the airport, it's also near Las Vegas Convention Center and Thomas and Mack Center
